cd ${PKG_ROOT}
go run ${WORK}/main.go
cd ${WORK}
cmp stdout want.txt

-- main.go --
package main

import . "github.com/efd6/dispear"

func main() {
	DESCRIPTION("set")

	SET("field.to.set").COPY_FROM("src.field").IGNORE_EMPTY(true)
	SET("field.to.set").VALUE("value").OVERRIDE(false)
	SET("field.to.set").VALUE("{{{other.field}}}").OVERRIDE(false)
	SET("field.to.set").VALUE(1).OVERRIDE(false)
	SET("field.to.set").VALUE(1.5).OVERRIDE(false)
	SET("field.to.set").VALUE(true).OVERRIDE(false)
	SET("field.to.set").VALUE(false).OVERRIDE(false)

	Generate()
}
-- want.txt --
---
description: set
processors:
  - set:
      tag: set_field_to_set_1
      field: field.to.set
      copy_from: src.field
      ignore_empty_value: true
  - set:
      tag: set_field_to_set_2
      field: field.to.set
      value: value
      override: false
  - set:
      tag: set_field_to_set_3
      field: field.to.set
      value: '{{{other.field}}}'
      override: false
  - set:
      tag: set_field_to_set_4
      field: field.to.set
      value: 1
      override: false
  - set:
      tag: set_field_to_set_5
      field: field.to.set
      value: 1.5
      override: false
  - set:
      tag: set_field_to_set_6
      field: field.to.set
      value: true
      override: false
  - set:
      tag: set_field_to_set_7
      field: field.to.set
      value: false
      override: false
